"Whomever seems friendliest." Airbomber replied to Infectra...
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:01 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Infec=
tra: Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
    ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent:=
 Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "Wel=
l, you shall be amazed at how much Liono screwed up the future, but you sho=
uld go and get aquainted with some of the other bots." Airbomber said to In=
fectra...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
=
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
 =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra nodded and looked around=
* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectra says=
 to The Radicons*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECO=
DE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4=
:49 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "Give them a chance, I=
'm sure they'll like you." Airbomber whispered back to Infectra...
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
   =
       Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectra smiles waves to an=
y bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra wh=
ispers to Airbomber*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednes=
day, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


     =
       "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming=
 their blaster's at Infectra.

            "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra=
! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

            "These Ra=
dicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to help them and ran =
away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

            "W=
e have our gestalt form and we're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plin=
tissa walked away angrily...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
            From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
            Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
              Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


              *Infectra nods and follows the Radicons* In=
fectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to the=
 Radicons*
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                Fr=
om: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: =
Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  =
              Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying =
nothing when the other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were abou=
t to stab each other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug ins=
tead.

                Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and t=
hey walked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

            =
    "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa =
asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hid=
e.

                Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drink=
ing tea and they left again.

                "Who shall we join with, dear=
?" Inzola asked.

                "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos r=
eplies. They walk on until they see the Alliance base.

                "Th=
is one looks good, lets go and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deem=
os said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the base.

                "Ahem, e=
xcuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team, we have been looking fo=
r a faction to join, and it appears that it is you who will obviously win t=
he Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" =
Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no killing a bot things or any=
thing.)

                Gangon had a nightmare, He was again tied to the m=
agical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did=
, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 headed, one h=
ead Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head i=
n pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. He considered=
 that thing about getting a replacement body, how it would be a good idea j=
ust in case he had to get out of this dump, which was probable if he wanted=
 to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

      =
          The Radicons looked at Infectra.

                "Now, all you n=
eed to do is follow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure=
 they won't mind, seeing as how you would make a great addition to their gr=
oup." Airbomber said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for I=
nfectra to follow.

                Artist walked around the war room in ci=
rcles, not quite knowing where he was going.
